overview:
Senior Vice President â€“ Investment Banking Technology & Communications Group

Mr. MacCormack joined Raymond James & Associates in 1999 and is a member of the Technology & Communications group. Prior to joining Raymond James, Mr. MacCormack worked in the Chicago office of Houlihan Lokey Howard & Zukin where he was involved in numerous financial advisory engagements, including business and securities valuations, mergers and acquisitions, fairness and solvency opinions, litigation support, and estate and gift tax valuation.

Mr. MacCormack received his M.B.A. degree from Stanford University and his B.S. degree in Finance, with high honors, from the University of Illinois.

relationships.title: Senior Vice President, Tech & Telecom Group
